instruction: According follow APIs to create use stories for a Online MovieTicket website.

instances.input:
User Information
POST create_user() /register Create user
POST login_user() /login Login user
instances.output:
Use Case Scenario: Online Movie Ticket Booking System

Actor: User

Preconditions: The user has access to the internet and the Online Movie Ticket Booking System.

Flow of Events:

    The user opens the Online Movie Ticket Booking System and clicks on the "Register" button.
    The system presents a registration form to the user.
